name: Frog Vision
description:
Orient yourself in the cave using your eyes and ears. Find the secret garden, find tranquilty in silence. Frogs have almost 360 vision, and listen with their lungs. Walk around, have a hop. Take in the sights, listen to the change in sounds and eat the "bugs" to get a sense of peace and quiet. Programming by Sarah. Art and sound by me. Shared design. Made for IVGD Winter Frogjam 2022.

Look with mouse.
Click to move.
There is no end,
There is only a secret garden,
There is only silence.
